headlines.description: Chelsea came from behind to beat Arsenal 2-1 and leave Mikel Arteta waiting for his first win since taking over at the club.

video.headline: Hislop: A step in the right direction for Arsenal despite loss

headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea fight back to deny Arteta first win

headlines.description: Liverpool extended their lead at the top of the Premier League to 13 points with a 1-0 win against Wolves that was overshadowed by VAR.

video.headline: Hislop calls Premier League's VAR protocols 'atrocious'

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool go 13 clear amid VAR controversy

headlines.description: Manchester City used second-half goals from Sergio Aguero and Kevin De Bruyne to beat Sheffield United 2-0 at the Etihad on Sunday night.

video.headline: How the Premier League's VAR 'snobbery' has led to flaws

headlines.shortLinkText: Man City beat Sheff Utd with Aguero, De Bruyne goals
